characters.name: John Haigh
characters.description: Nicely spoken Yorkshire accent This part will be quite demanding. On Stage almost all the time, switching clothes, going from scene to scene constantly.

characters.name: Barbara Stevens
characters.description: No accent. Haigh's girlfriend from Crawley.

characters.name: Beatrice Hamer
characters.description: Haigh's wife has a light Yorkshire accent.

characters.name: John Haigh Senior
characters.description: John Haigh's Father. Yorkshire accent; a Plymouth Brethren minister.

characters.name: William McSwann
characters.description: employer of John Haigh. A London Businessman.
